name: GetPausedIncidentReportCounts
description:
Retrieve reporting counts for paused incident usage.

This tool returns reporting counts for paused incident usage within a specified reporting period, up to a 6-month lookback. It is available with the Event Intelligence package or Digital Operations plan.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: Specifies the API version or response format using the 'Accept' header. Typically a string like 'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2'.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the media type. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date for the reporting period to search, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: The start of the date range over which you want to search.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for the date range over which to search for paused incident reports. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: The end of the date range over which you want to search.
